dm:bugtracker.dm:product: Installing Fujitsu Enterprise Postgres on SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for IBM Z and LinuxONE - Getting Started

productname: SLES 12 SP5 and 15 SP2, Fujitsu Enterprise Postgres 12
meta: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for IBM Z and LinuxOne 15 SP2
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for IBM Z and LinuxOne 12 SP5

abstract.para: This document provides systems administrators and enterprise solution architects an introduction to installing Fujitsu Enterprise Postgres on a SUSE Linux Enterprise Server virtual machine running on an IBM Z or LinuxONE system.
